pages.title: Egg!
pages.text: Ranching for $(#FFA500)Egg $()is simple! This is the 3rd capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Animal Ranched: Chicken$(br)Item Given: Egg$(br)Tool Required: Hand

pages.name: Capability Level 0
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 0$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Egg$()
